short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-refresh and visual highlight of changes on reddit post pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Life coming at you too fast? Can't keep up with it all? You need *What's New, Reddit*! It automatically updates and visually highlights what posts are new in every subreddit you hang out on. Show's new posts since your last visit and how many new comments there are on each post.

Every minute (configurable in options) it will auto-refresh if you are on the page, or will highlight new pages if you return.
